text: Hi! I'm in the same page as <@U01BFPQJVC6>, where can i get some video trainings for this?

the whole user journey for learning the CMS in HubSpot seems disjointed. I found myself just chasing my tail clicking links to various pages. HS should be leading users down a definite step 1 step 2 path, otherwise you will just turn users and potentially customers away.

Another issue, on the "*QUICK START ACTIVITY*" page it says the following:- "Have both this Discovery Kit and the CMS app open in separate windows."... and then gives no direction to the user as to how to do either. This is just bad UX. So straight away your users/customers are left in a state of confusion before they have even begun
The documentation/training links to the Marketplace from 'File & Templates' but this link is not in HubSpot? This is just a sloppy onboarding experience for your CMS. Its such a turn off!
Greetings All! Thanks for the HSDev invite. Looking forward to collaborating and contributing.
